# üî™ Executioner Evil

Executioner has an execution target, which will be indicated by a diamond „Äå‚ô¶„Äç next to their name. If the execution target is killed, the Executioner will be changed to Crewmate, Jester or Opportunist according to the settings. If the execution target is voted out in the meeting, the Executioner wins. Note: Jester, Executioner, and Innocent can win together.

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Executioners that can be in a match.
  • Can Target Impostors
    • ON: Executioner can Target Impostors
    • OFF: Executioner cannot target Impostors
  • Can Target Neutral Killers
    • ON: Executioner can Target Neutral Killers
    • OFF: Executioner cannot target Neutral Killers
  • Can Target Neutral Benign
    • ON: Executioner can Target Neutral Benign Roles
    • OFF: Executioner cannot target Neutral Benign Roles
  • Can Target Neutral Evil
    • ON: Executioner can Target Neutral Evil Roles
    • OFF: Executioner cannot target Neutral Evil Roles
  • Can Target Neutral Chaos
    • ON: Executioner can Target Neutral Chaos Roles
    • OFF: Executioner cannot target Neutral Chaos Roles
  • Knows role of target
    • ON: the Executioner can see their target's role
    • OFF: Executioner sees the target as a normal player
  • When Target Dies, Executioner becomes
    • Crewmate
    • Jester
    • Opportunist

From: TOH
